channel.title: Recording?
channel.description:
hi... i have a homework problem in ubuntu... the homework is norwegian... we have recently been in norway and we are going to tell into a microphone what we did and some of the great stuff there. but when i press record on the internet page we are going to record it at it says this.
[IMG]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt292/kneistol/Skjermdump-7.png[/img]
how do i fix this problem?

item.title: Recording?
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

knuteirik@KE-desktop:~$ java -version java version "1.6.0_18" OpenJDK Runtime Environment (IcedTea6 1.8) (6b18-1.8-4ubuntu3) OpenJDK Server VM (build 16.0-b13, mixed mode)

thats what i get so im following the tut right now and i hope it works

Read full topic

item.title: Recording?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I’ve got an idea what could be wrong, what version of Ubuntu do you have? Open a terminal and type ‘java -version’, if the output says something like this(anything about OpenJDK or IcedTea):

$ java -version java version "1.6.0_18" OpenJDK Runtime Environment (IcedTea6 1.8.1) (6b18-1.8.1-0ubuntu1) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 16.0-b13, mixed mode)

Then you don’t have sun’s java, follow the instructions here to get it set up on your computer:
http://www.ubuntugeek.com/how-install-sun-java-runtime-environment-jre-in-ubuntu-10-04-lucid-lynx.html

Read full topic

item.title: Recording?
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

i am sorry but we students only got one username and password each and i can’t just hand it out… and besides… my teacher have made so all the pages is https://fronter.com/siljan so i can’t link to the page… can you just tell me where i download the jar and how to sign it?

this is how it looks like

Read full topic

item.title: Recording?
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“kneistol, post:3, topic:360541”]download what jar? this is in fronter.com and i am trying to make a recording so how can i download the jar and sign it?[/quote]Link me to the exact page that runs the applet. If authentication is required, get me a username and password.

Read full topic

item.title: Recording?
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

download what jar? this is in fronter.com and i am trying to make a recording so how can i download the jar and sign it?

Read full topic

item.title: Recording?
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

Is the applet signed? It should be. You might have accidentally denied the request to run the applet without the typical sandbox restrictions an applet is ran with. If it isn’t signed, you have to download the JAR, sign it, and run it again.

Read full topic
